title: Biogen Stock Is Soaring as Hope Returns for Alzheimer’s Drug
text:
Biogen shares were 28% higher on Tuesday after the company stunned investors with news that it planned to submit for Food and Drug Administration approval the experimental Alzheimer’s drug that appeared to fail in clinical trials earlier this year.

The failure of the drug, called aducanumab, cut Biogen’s share price by 29% in a single day in March. The stock had not recovered as of Monday. Aducanumab’s failure dominated investor sentiment around Biogen (BIIB), sparked broader worries about the broader biotech sector, and...
description: When the experimental drug for Alzheimer’s, aducanumab, appeared to fail in March, it sent Biogen’s stock plunging and sparked concerns about the biotech sector. Now, the drug’s return has raised hopes -- and questions.
